channel.title: performantcode.com on the bookmarks of wews
channel.description: Recent content in performantcode.com on the bookmarks of wews

item.title: Do you really know CORS?
item.description: Same Origin Policy & CORS SOP prevents documents or scripts loaded from one origin (e.g. a domain) to access resources from other origins for all requests, browsers always and automatically attach any cookies bounded for the destination domain. exceptions - img, script, iframe. why? tags are in the the control of the browser whereas javascript is in full control and as such a AJAX call is potentially more dangerous.
